name: Trick or Treat Tower!
description:
It's Halloween Night!
The Trick or Treat Tower appears on the horizon! Prota, our strange little hero, decides to climb the tower in order to become The Ultimate Candy King and get all the precious sweets. But before he can do that, he must face three monstrous challenges... Will Prota achieve his goal? Or will he have to wait till the next year for another shot? Let's find out! OwO
  • Dodge a rain of Falling Rocks!
    Is it just me, or they look a bit like potatoes?
  • Jump over hordes of Flying Skulls!
    They no fly, Jump good!
  • Defeat the undead and Splat some Zombies!
    Back to bed, brain heads!
  • CLIMB TOWER. BECOME CANDY KING!
    Yessssssssssss!!!
Game Programming:
Damian Mazas 
Gonzalo Lamela
Guillermo de Armas
